## panicProcessing() function

方法装饰器, 该装饰器会检查 AnomalousChain 中的错误对象是否为空， 如果不为空 则停止执行被装饰的函数

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function panicProcessing(opt?: Partial<panicProcessingOpt>): (target: any, key: string, desc: TypedPropertyDescriptor<any>) => void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt | Partial&lt;[panicProcessingOpt](./utils.panicprocessingopt.md)<!-- -->&gt; | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

(target: any, key: string, desc: TypedPropertyDescriptor&lt;any&gt;) =&gt; void

## Remarks

必须搭配 [AnomalousChain](./utils.anomalouschain.md)
